title: Fishing Planet: Topwater Kayak Pack
description: Topwater Kayak Pack contains not only spinning and casting rods, powerful reels, wobblers, frogs, and many other surface lures, but also a branded kayak that will allow you to fish literally anywhere on the waterway!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Topwater Kayak Pack
<!--text-->
Tired of sitting with a fishing rod on the shore? Then Topwater Kayak Pack is what you need! It contains not only spinning and casting rods, powerful reels, wobblers, frogs, and many other surface lures, but also a branded kayak that will allow you to fish literally anywhere on the waterway! We haven’t forgotten about a unique jacket in the colors of the tournament, a spacious case for fishing rods, and a reliable sizable net that fits even the largest catch. With such a bundle, you will undoubtedly have a wonderful time fishing, and also claim victory in many tournaments!

Topwater Kayak Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* RIVERTEX™ TWKC InfinityCast™ 5' 3" (160) NE - Length: 5' 3" (1.6 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz (25–70 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 8–33 Lb (6–20 kg); Action: Moderate
* RIVERTEX™ TWKC BeastMaster™ 7' 6" (230) - Length: 7' 6" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz (18–56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 24–60 Lb (11–27.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast

Reels:
* RIVERTEX™ TWKC TyphoonPro™ 5500 - Ratio: 6.5; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/100 (0.5/100), Braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 44 Lb (20 kg); Brake: Centrifugal
* RIVERTEX™ TWKC Supperior™ 5000 - Ratio: 5.5; Recovery: 37" (95 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/100 (0.5/100), Braid 30/170 (0.28/170); Max Drag: 58 Lb (26.5 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
* Braid .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 61.5 Lb (28 kg)
* Fluoro .024" (0.6 mm) - Test: 40 Lb (18.1 kg)

* Titanium Leader .012" (0.3) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 41 Lb (18.6 kg)
* Titanium Leader .014" (x11) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 55.1 Lb (25.1 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .029" (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 60.6 Lb (27.5 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .024" (x11) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 39.9 Lb (18.1 kg)

* Walkers: Walker 2 Oz (56 g), #4/0 (x4), Walker 2 1/4 Oz (64 g), #5/0 (x4)
* Topwater Lures: Frog-popper 1 Oz. (28 g), #5/0 (x6), Frog 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #4/0 (x6), Mouse Lure 3/4 Oz (21 g), #3/0 (x2), Mouse Lure 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #5/0 (x2), Mouse Lure 1 5/7 Oz (48 g), #7/0 (x2)
* Poppers: Major Popper 1 Oz. (28 g), #3/0 (x2), Major Popper 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #5/0 (x2), Major Popper 2 1/2 Oz. (70 g), #7/0 (x2)
* Toppers: Topper 5/8 Oz. (18 g), #2/0 (x2), Topper 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x2), Topper 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g), #6/0 (x2)


EQUIPMENT
* MagFin™ TWKC Impetuous Kayak  - Length: 10 ft 4 in (3.15 m); Width: 35 in (88.9 cm); Weight: 62 Lb (28 kg); Max Speed: 6 mph (10 kmh); Passenger Capacity: 1
* Garry Scott™ TWKC KayakMaster Jacket  - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* RIVERTEX™ TWKC RodShelter Rod Case  - Rods: 2; Reels: 4; Lines: 2
* Garry Scott™ FishCastle L Plus  - Max Single Fish Weight: 165 Lb (75 kg); Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb (200 kg)

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Oregon License
Advanced California License
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced Peru License
Advanced Mongolia License
